item.title: Deploying Deep Learning Models with CloudML
item.description: In this post we will go over deploying deep learning models to Googleâ€™s cloud machine learning engine in R with the keras and cloudml packages. The cloudml package built by the good people of RSudio allows us to train deep learning models built with keras and tensorflow in the cloud. It also allows the deployment of trained models to the Google global prediction platform, which we can use to make predictions with a simple API call.
